title: Did they remove the gifting of chroma skins? Why
body:
I have some spare rp on my second account wanted to gift a yasuo high noon chroma to main but cant figure out how to.

I gifted myself a cait chroma a few weeks ago did they change it

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, you can access the *Gifting Center* by launching into the Legacy Client from the login screen for the Beta, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
I tried to do it in the Legacy Client, but the chromas do not show there either.
Gifting individual chromas should still work but you have to use the old client for now.
